name: PaintballX
description:
PaintballX is an online multiplayer FPS paintball game!

Current Features!

-Weapon Pickups: pickup better weapons around the map for a competitive advantage against your opponents.

-Sliding: slide around the map quickly for better positioning.

-Game modes: Free for all and Team Deathmatch.

-Paintball Maps: Play on our paintball maps inspired from real paintball fields!

-Scoreboard: Compete with your friends to see who can get the most kills!

AND MORE!
